post.description: Returns a paginated list of author rows with filtering and sorting

requestBody.description: Query parameters for filtering and pagination

delete.description: Deletes multiple author rows by their IDs. Maximum 1000 rows per request.

requestBody.description: Array of row IDs to delete

rowIds.description: Array of row IDs to delete (max 1000)

get.description: Returns a single author row by its ID

post.description: Creates a new author row with the specified ID

409.description: Conflict - row with this ID already exists

put.description: Updates an existing author row (full replacement)

patch.description: Partially updates a author row using JSON Patch operations

patches.description: Array of patch operations to apply

delete.description: Deletes a author row by its ID

post.description: Uploads a file to a specific field in the author row

get.summary: Get author foreign keys by post
get.description: Returns rows from post that reference this author

TestProjectJsonFilter.description: JSON filter conditions for data field

path.description: Path within data field for nested sorting (e.g., "user.age")

type.description: Data type for sorting when using data field

TestProjectPatchOperation.description: JSON Patch operation (RFC 6902 subset - only replace)

path.description: JSON path using dot notation for objects and [index] for arrays (e.g., "name", "user.email", "items[0]")

value.description: The value to set at the specified path (any valid JSON value)
